trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" /> class encapsulates the transport security settings for queued transports.
trans-unit.target: Die <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" />-Klasse kapselt die Transportsicherheitseinstellungen für in der Warteschlange stehende Transporte ein.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" /> class.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode" /> that is associated with this instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode" /> ab oder legt ihn fest, der dieser Instanz der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode" /> that is associated with this instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqAuthenticationMode" />, der dieser Instanz der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing (MSMQ) can authenticate messages that are sent to message queues that require authentication, or messages can explicitly request authentication.
trans-unit.target: Message Queuing (MSMQ) kann Meldungen authentifizieren, die an Meldungswarteschlangen gesendet werden, die Authentifizierung erfordern oder die eine Authentifizierung explizit anfordern können.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm" /> that is associated with this instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm" /> ab oder legt ihn fest, der dieser Instanz der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm" /> that is associated with this instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqEncryptionAlgorithm" />, der dieser Instanz der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: Message Queuing (MSMQ) can encrypt messages on the wire when transferring messages between message queue managers.
trans-unit.target: Message Queuing (MSMQ) kann Meldungen verschlüsseln, wenn es Meldungen zwischen Meldungswarteschlangen-Managern überträgt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> that is associated with this instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> ab oder legt ihn fest, der dieser Instanz der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" /> that is associated with this instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Der <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel" />, der dieser Instanz der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm" /> that is associated with this instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ruft den <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm" /> ab oder legt ihn fest, der dieser Instanz der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.MsmqTransportSecurityElement" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm" /> that is associated with this instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqSecureHashAlgorithm" />, der dieser Instanz der <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.MsmqTransportSecurity" />-Klasse zugeordnet ist.
